name: Super Zero Adventures
description:
SUPER ZERO ADVENTURES

An arcade-RPG game about lonely robot exploring distant planets, that seems to be - at least at first glance - abandoned by its inhabitants.

In the future game will contain 3 core modes/mechanics:

- Exploration mode (that you can play DEMO here)

- Platformer mode (DEMO to be developed)

- Fly mode (DEMO to be developed)

There will be also 4th "kind-of-mode": Galaxy map, which will be really a level selection screen with a mini-game inside of it.

Full game will be developed once I finish each mode DEMO/proof of concept.

All assets has been created by myself (game idea, pixel art, sfx/music etc.).
